text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 86406008 (Human immunodeficiency virus infection)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    CodeDisplay
    B20Human immunodeficiency virus [HIV] disease

name: ElixhauserHIVAIDSVS
title: Elixhauser Comorbid Condition Value Set for HIV-AIDS
description: Elixhauser Comorbid Condition Value Set for HIV-AIDS. ICD-10 codes are drawn from https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/comorbidityicd10/comformat_icd10cm_2019_1.txt.
